Name: FBG Arcade Machine
About the game: TWO GAMES... ONE PACKAGE! Run and Gun Things start slow - but with an ever-increasing player speed, you'll soon be masterfully dashing across the stage blasting ghastly ghosts, collecting coins and ammo, all while avoiding the unbreakable barriers Rock and Stone This game only requires mouse input, but that doesn't mean it will be easy! Stand your ground and protect yourself from endless waves of rocks and stones. Stay alive long enough to set a high score! Support There are links available for direct access to Freshly Baked Games support line. Fully committed to looking into, and patching bugs along the way. Speaking about support... I would like to thank each and everyone who buys this game, and that everyone enjoys playing it as much as I've enjoyed making it. This game is the first release I have ever done. Hope your days are as wonderful as you are! Happy Gaming!
